mapper.select: SELECT me.id, me.menu_name, me.menu_zhname, mes.id AS ids, mes.menu_name AS NAME, mes.menu_zhname AS zhname, ms.id as msid, ms.menu_name as me_name, ms.menu_zhname as me_zhname FROM tb_menu me LEFT JOIN tb_menu mes ON me.id = mes.menu_parent LEFT JOIN tb_menu ms ON ms.menu_parent=mes.id WHERE me.menu_parent = 0 AND me.is_merchant != 1 ORDER BY me.id ASC
